saying: A fool and their Bells are soon parted.
description: Chrissy is a peppy rabbit villager in the Animal Crossing series. She originally appeared in Doubutsu no Mori e+. She was absent in Animal Crossing: Wild World but returns in Animal Crossing: City Folk. According to the official Japanese Animal Crossing: City Folk website, she is the younger sister of Francine. This information is later confirmed to western players in Animal Crossing: Pocket Camp.
